title: The Letter: a film about legal rights. - [Serbian version].
creator_contributor_role: Legal Aid Commission of Victoria, production company
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Legal services - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Legal services - Australia
description: A guide to the basic legal rights, entitlements and responsibilities of people living in Australia, particularly non-English speaking migrants. The laws relating to business, presumption of innocence, issues relating to employee/employer relations, financial support, racism, anti-discrimination and tenancy laws are discussed. Illustrates differences between legal rights in Australia and in other countries. Dubbed in Serbian.
